body:
Hi,

I am trying to run a full node on Macbook Pro with OS `Mac OSX v10.13.3` with freshly download bitcoin-qt `Bitcoin Core version v0.15.1 (64-bit)`

However it fails with:
```
Ã¢ÂÂ  MacOS ./Bitcoin-Qt
Assertion failed: (vMsgsBeforeOpenLog), function LogPrintStr, file util.cpp, line 348.
[1]    948 abort      ./Bitcoin-Qt
```

I expect it to launch successfully and show an invitation to choose the datadir.

The computer specs:
```
 Model Name:	MacBook Pro
  Model Identifier:	MacBookPro14,3
  Processor Name:	Intel Core i7
  Processor Speed:	2.8 GHz
  Number of Processors:	1
  Total Number of Cores:	4
  L2 Cache (per Core):	256 KB
  L3 Cache:	6 MB
  Memory:	16 GB
  Boot ROM Version:	MBP143.0169.B00
  SMC Version (system):	2.45f0
```

The error details are in the attachment.
[error.txt](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/files/1734513/error.txt)
title: Error: Assertion failed: (vMsgsBeforeOpenLog), function LogPrintStr, file util.cpp, line 348 on startup.
